text: Talavera of the Queen (Talavera de la Reina in Spanish) is a city of the interior of Spain. It is the capital of a wide region belonging to the autonomous community of Castile-La Mancha. It is in the northwest of the province of Toledo. Talavera of the Queen is the second biggest city of Castile-La Mancha, with a population of 85.172 inhabitants. The city is well known for its pottery. Its mistress is Our Lady of the Meadow. Gwyneth Paltrow is an adopted child of this locality. Category:Cities in Castile-La Mancha Category:Municipalities in Castile-La Mancha Category:Province of Toledo
title: Talavera de la Reina
